TopicTitle: What kind of dessert is Minmus?

Articles.Content:
I think we can all agree, Minmus must be made of some minty dessert... So what do you think it is? So far, the canidates are:

Mint Ice Cream

Pudding

Slushy/Snowcone

Milkshake

Hard mint/mint chocolate

Please, discuss! Tell what you think it is, and/or suggest something else that is possible!
I vote for ice cream, because Minmus's surface is all frozen and solid. Plus, it seems like it'd make a nice dessert planetoid!

> 
> I vote for ice cream, because Minmus's surface is all frozen and solid. Plus, it seems like it'd make a nice dessert planetoid!

Blue Bell brand?

Mintmus is **Mint Choc Chip**; the turquoise ice surface is the Mint Ice Cream, the boulders are chunks of Chocolate.

That's why it's called Mintmus ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Ã¢â‚¬â€¹I'm going with other: Minmus is "Just". Because when you try to land there, it always gives out your *just desserts.*

Research at my Minmus Institute is still ongoing. 

Current results suggest some combo of mint ice cream and jelly, and lime flavour hard lollies.
The Minmus Paper Airplane League will never be stopped!
I think that proper scientific clasificasion should be Om class Nomnetoid.
Last time i sent a kerbal to Minmus, had him take some surface samples, and send him back, we found out it tastes like chicken.

The word month comes from the orbital period of our moon. If the orbital period of Mun is often called a munth, then the orbital period of Minmus is called a minth. Minmus has a very minty color.

If it walks like a duck and quacks like a duck. You get my point. Minmus is mint.

> 
> I think that proper scientific clasificasion should be Om class Nomnetoid.

Om, nom nom?
I sent a Kerbal there to take a surface sample so that we could definitively answer the question. Unfortunately he had eaten it by the time he came back.
Sour lime hard candy.
NONE of the options ... it's clearly made from mascarpone cheese.

You forgot Mint Sorbet!

It is frozen Mint Sorbet!
Either Ice Cream or Pudding, but I think Ice Cream is better for the Minmus Mintchip Options.
Mint Ice Cream. Maybe there are some chocolate chips beneath the crust...

Time to be the party pooper.

it is made of ice, dirt, and other stuff clumped together by gravity.

It used to be mint ice cream, before it was mined to the core by kethane drills and subsequently eaten by kerbals ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I have always imagined Minmus being made out of turqoise colored marzipan... Probably because my mom makes delicious cakes covered with the stuff.
The Kraken had a cold, and thus was created Minmus.
I see Minmus as mint ice cream.

> 
> It used to be mint ice cream, before it was mined to the core by kethane drills and subsequently eaten by kerbals ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

That's a good idea for life support... Ice Cream factory.
I've been all over Minmus and didn't find a lick of any ice cream, just ice.
It's a ball of mint leaves, that have frozen due to the coldness of space.
